general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Requirements vary by municipality. Columbus requires plans sealed by Ohio-registered design professional.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 25 kW residential. AEP Ohio, Duke Energy Ohio, FirstEnergy primary utilities.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Ohio Rev. Code 5301.012 protects solar access rights.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 90-100 mph.

licensing.license_type: Ohio Construction Industry Licensing Board electrical contractor license required.

notes: Growing solar market. Cincinnati reviews residential permits within 5 business days. Cleveland requires zoning review. Columbus requires Ohio-registered design professional sealed plans.
